ygData.subject: Re: AC vs Stat enhancing armor
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe let s not forget that resist is a supertaunt so get the mobs off me quick thing as well (; aye a regular group is good.....i fight in a semi reg group
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe let's not forget that "resist is a supertaunt so get the mobs off me
quick" thing as well (; aye a regular group is good.....i fight in a semi reg
group in sol b at the bat cave....usually me, pally, and druid.....and others
that want to join when we have an open spot..i've come to know when to heal the
pally, and when to sit and med...which is most of the time with those blasted
lcd's and lava beetles....(;

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 50 human cleric of The Rathe

Heather Daley wrote:

> From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
> I would definitely go with the stat increasing items. In my experiences
> with the game, this is what I have found. A cleric will never be a tank and
> yes you will get hit, Mobs tend to dislike clerics when they heal, do DD or
> Stun, so AC is a good thing to have but Mana is king for a cleric, In my
> opinion. AC will in no way, shape or form save your life.
